metadata.how_to_trigger: Click on Cmmander with the mother not available for dialogue, 160.29; 51.441; -15.193

1.speaker: Blaze Liara Portyr
1.text: Commander Portyr, acting Marshal of the Fist. If you have a crime to report, please wait outside - we are currently at capacity.

2.speaker: Blaze Liara Portyr
2.text: I apologise for the hassle that woman caused. Such time-wasters and troublemakers are a plague on the Flaming Fist.
2.context: NodeContext: a touch frustrtaed, she wants to help as many people as she can but she's stretched thin

3.speaker: Blaze Liara Portyr
3.text: I have a city to protect, refugees to manage, and an army on my door - I do not have time to chat.

4.speaker: Blaze Liara Portyr
4.text: I have the strangest memory of a fey-like creature - perhaps I should rest before my next shift.
4.context: NodeContext: sore,  confused (the hag's curse has been lifted)

5.speaker: Blaze Liara Portyr
5.text: Forgive me, I have the most pounding of headaches. If you have any issues, one of my subordinates will see to you.
5.context: NodeContext: sore,  confused (the hag's curse has been lifted)
